text: They're understaffed but our server Marissa was really nice. She talked to our antsy 5 year old. Drinks were always full even though  she was new. I liked there pizza better then the hut on ofallon square.

text: We have always had great food when ordering in the evening. However, we stopped in today for lunch and received the polar opposite. Buffet was mediocre, drinks were very late and we had ordered a basket of stuffed garlic knots. They came …More

text: I’m giving this place a 4, pizza and wings are always hot and the place is pretty clean. I waited almost an hour for a take out order but they were visibly slammed.  In my lengthy wait I got to here a lot of gossip between the staff …More

text: Pizza was horrible! There was not one spec of bacon on the pizza and the taste was just nasty. Never again.

name: Brian Kennedy
text: Awful! Don't waste your money. Pizza was dry, burnt, and disgusting. Called to get a replacement pizza and got another awful pizza 50 minutes later. I will never order from here again.

text: Food and service by Zach was excellent.   5.00 meal deal went up to 6.00 but was still very reasonable for amount of food for 2 people.

name: Rich Cline
text: The service was great. The pasta looked like it would have been good, but got pizza and boneless wings instead. Carb-heavy and acid reflux-inducing. They do have a salad bar. Beyond that, no real healthy options.

text: Fast and friendly.  Food was great.  Reasonably clean. My only issue was the price! When did they get so high? $40 + tip for 2 of us.

text: Horrible experience. They have very poor management in place at that storethey have no idea of how to run a restaurant that you can go in and sit down and have a reasonably peaceful dinner they had a crowd come in that were absolute animals …More

name: Paul
text:
The weekday lunch buffet is great. Cheese, pepperoni, sausage, supremes - hand tossed and thin crust.  There's also desert pizzas and a salad bar.
The decor inside is very much classic Pizza Hut. There's even an arcade game.

text: They have very very good food and drinks and then all you can eat from 11:30am until 1:30pm.Pizza and salad bar and others to that is my favorite place to eat.Pizza Hut  they have the best Restaurant and Pizza in Town.

text: Food tasted stale, and was dry. I don't recommend.

text: This is a very good Pizza Hut. Their pizza's are always good and they don't skimp on the ingredients. We have always found the staff to be friendly.

text: Good pizza order calzone pepperoni I wanted mushrooms with it they said they can't put mushrooms in it do 2 dietary percentages which is to me not the truth because they pre-made  them so you only have certain choices.  I know how that works worked for Pizza Hut for 11 years

name: Douglas Birk
text: This review is specifically for the weekday lunch buffet. While it features the same fare as other locations, the salad bar was stocked well with fresh ingredients and there were an abundance of different pizzas, along with dessert Pizza with so much topping it was delightful. I felt I got well over my money's worth.

name: Travis Morgan
text: Waitress was friendly and knowledgeable. Dining room is classic Pizza Hut and they play classic rock. There was even a Pac Man arcade machine!

name: debbie kueck
text: We ordered 2 medium pizzas from this pizza hut last night! Nov,3rd. We were told it would be a 35 to 45 min to delivery it was more closer to a hour. We also asked for extra sauce and did not get that. We were told by the driver that is was …More

name: J D Barton
text: Ordered a dozen of the hottest wings available and a med pepperoni original crust pizza. The MOST amazing wings I've ever had! The pizza was perfect! Crust was buttery and lightly crisp. Not doughy at all.

name: Nae Moore
text: The thing I like about this pizza hut is that they have a lunch buffet. With that being said I just wished they had a larger variety of pizzas that came out.

name: Kevin S
text: Pizza Hut and this location continue to disappoint.  The service is inconsistent but the food is really bad.  The crust is usual stale with the cheese and toppings tasting cheap and greasy.  Its bad even for a chain pizza.  There are definitely much better options.

name: Stephen Bohm
text: Super busy tonight, but they definitely kept customer experience at a high. One of the few remaining dine-in locations, and is always worth the little extra drive.
